##Data Visualization Exercise
```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
starwars
```

##Mass Vs Height
we will study mass vs weight relationship through a scatterplot
```{r warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(starwars, aes(x = height, y = mass)) +
  geom_point()
labs(title = "Mass vs. height of Starwars characters",
       x = "Height (cm)", y = "Weight (kg)")
```
